pages.text:
[Page Title: R Kitchen]

R kitchen

Our five course tasting menu is recreated every day by combining seasonal ingredients with the inspiration and imagination of our chefs

we’re A KITCHEN, NOT A RESTAURANT.

R Kitchen is designed to give chefs the freedom to play with food as they see fit without the constraints of a set menu. Since we love making adjustments as we go, menus are not available prior to checking in for your reservation.

We will always accommodate reasonable dietary restrictions to the best of our ability based on availability of product and with advanced notice.

Please let us know of any food allergies or dietary restrictions when making your reservation.

Our doors are open to everyone, but please keep in mind that you will be dining with the chefs. Please consider some content to be rated TV-MA and may not be words you want your kids to hear…

Prepare to get brunched in the face!

Are you ready for brunch R Kitchen style?! Check out the new pop -up event Reckless breakfast every Sunday morning at our West Ashely location with Chef Chris Seeley
Learn more

[Page Title: Locations — R Kitchen]

Locations

Join us at either of our 2 location in

Downtown Charleston or West Ashley

R KITCHEN DOWNTOWN
212 Rutledge AvenueCharleston, SC 29403 
Open Tuesday through Sunday

Seatings @ 6:00 pm and 8:00 pm

Dinner $70 Per Person + Tax

Wine and Beer options available for purchase - Wines - $30 bottle / $10 glass - Beer - $6/$9

Corkage fee $15

Limited street parking - Uber/Taxi is recommended

R KITCHEN WEST ASHLEY
1337 Ashley River RoadCharleston, SC 29407 
Open Tuesday through Saturday

Seatings @ 6:00 pm and 8:00 pm

Dinner $70 Per Person + Tax

On-Site Parking
